name: Pur3v4d3r Documentation
noteNameFormat: {{date|date:"YYYY-MM-DD"}}-docs-{{"create a 3-5 word kebab-case filename describing the documentation topic"|replace:" ":"-"|lower|safe_name}}

properties.name: aliases
properties.value: {{"Generate 2-4 aliases: the page title, the tool/framework + feature name, common abbreviations, and a descriptive phrase. Comma-separated."|split:", "}}

properties.name: tags
properties.value:
{{"Select 6-10 tags. Return comma-separated:

TYPE: type/reference, type/guide, type/tutorial, type/documentation
STATUS: status/seedling
TECH DOMAIN: obsidian, dataview, dataviewjs, templater, quickadd, meta-bind, javascript, python, automation, api-integration
PKM TECH: obsidian/plugins, obsidian/core-features, obsidian/customization, obsidian/advanced
CONCEPTS: frontmatter-design, template-automation, query-systems, workflow-automation"|split:", "}}

properties.name: type
properties.value: {{"Classify: reference, guide, tutorial, technique, api-docs. One word."}}

properties.name: software
properties.value: {{"Identify the primary software/tool this documentation covers. One or two words."}}
